title: Maximum 50% of total proposed Built-up area may be permitted for allied serices / support services including commercial and residential activities except polluting activities
clause_text: Maximum 50% of total proposed Built-up area may be permitted for allied serices / support services including commercial and residential activities except polluting activities.
section: (1) 7.8.2 For areas except areas mentioned in Regulation No.7.8.1 above and expect Regional Plan areas
